name: Egg Status: HATCHED
description:
This is a sequel to Joining The Council, a free minimalist-style experimental walking simulator I made. Unlike that however, this is a horror puzzle experience.

Backstory:

You are a member of the security force and are sent into the lab where an important egg is being examined for ancient alien life.  Has something gone wrong?

Follow me on Twitter to keep up-to-date on the progress of my games when I'm developing them and other stuff as well: https://twitter.com/omogonix
